KnowledgeItem.Title: MongoDBWorkflowHandlePKG
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for handling packages related to the installation of MongoDB by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding DataBlocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock MongoDBWorkflowHandlePKG and triggers the workflow for successful completion.

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks
				TargetMachine=${MDWHP:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				User=${MDWHP:User}
				Lib=APTSOURCEMODIFICATION
				PKG=mongodb-org
				Host=${MDWHP:Host}
				AptRepoUrl='${MDWHP:AptRepoUrl}'
				AptArchiveType=${MDWHP:AptArchiveType}
				AptDistribution='${MDWHP:AptDistribution}'
				AptComponents=${MDWHP:AptComponents}
				AptKey=${MDWHP:AptKey}
				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				/> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks
				TargetMachine=${MDWHP:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				User=${MDWHP:User}
				Lib=PKG
				PKG=mongodb-org
				Host=${MDWHP:Host}
				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				/> </NewBlock>
